author: Jonáš Jančařík
comment: I really like the minimalism of this watch face, especially when the thickness is turned very low. It use this one as an alternative to the Essential face. The inactive state is maybe almost too simple, but I don't see how it could be improved. My favourite detail is how the animated second bars break around the edge of the glass on Moto 360 - not sure you get the same effect on other watches. One minor nuisance: a "init UI error" is displayed when I switch to this face, but it only shows once.

author: Bryce Wilson
comment: All the usual options needed: Date formatting, weather, lose leading zero in hours in 12 hour format, adjustable full brightness time length, add : between hour : minutes, fonts, colors. In general though, the beginning of a very nice face.
title: Very classy but needs more options

author: Arik Licholat
comment: Settings are unstable. They don't remember what you previously entered so when you go back to tweak something, it resets everything. Also the date isn't visible in ambient mode. And to top it all off, the animations are choppy. Not a good face.

author: Troels Siggaard
comment: I loved the older version, but this yellow version with lines in the side is ugly to me. And what's up witj going to 24, when it should be 00, that's just strange.
title: Why does it go to 24?

author: Peter Marshall
comment: Would be nice to choose a different colour but nice none the less. Also to turn off the lines around the outside.
title: One of the best watch faces out there

author: Colin Shimrock
comment: Love the font thickness option. Could a color option be in the next update? Personally not a fan of the yellow. But looks great nonetheless.
title: Great design

author: Christopher Loren Garces
comment: This is a great looking watch face,, but the ambient light and font thickness setting reset every single time I try to set them to my preference.
title: Great looking, but...

comment: Would be ok but every time I change the settings they go to default when I go out of the app.
title: Not bad

author: Amilka Moses
comment: Really good work, I like the simplicity of it, but there needs to be a colour setting or the option to but different colours
title: Excellently - but needs colour options

author: Angel Hernandez
comment: I love this watch face but I wish we couls change the colors, especially the yellow.
title: Beautiful but...

author: Jim Robertson
comment: One of my favorites, but wish it had the option to show battery level...
title: Great watch face

author: Oppie Adirono
comment: Not adapted for Moto360. When Ambient Screen is active, it doesn't show the time.

author: Michael Cantor
comment: Great aesthetics but needs thinner font when enlarged
title: Clear and easy to read

author: devin vosburgh
comment: Being able to adjust thickness was perfect. Am I missing something though, is there not a way to make it 12 hour mode?

reply.author: www.iFace.watch
reply.content: A new update is available today with 12 hour mode, depending on your device setting it automatically shows 12 or 24 format

title: Update was great

author: Stephen Garrett
comment: Did not look as good as displayed in screenshots on the Zen 2. Quite clunky animation, especially on the 59-00 second.

author: Albert Sphon
comment: Stuck with yellow color theme, crappy font selection, bad animation.  User options are very limited.
title: Potential

author: Ian Mitchell
comment: I would like to be able to pick a time before the ambient screen cuts in.
title: No option to keep amin screen on longer

comment: Cut part of the zero off in the minute portion
title: Zen Watch
